text: Thank God It's Friday is a 1978 American musical comedy movie directed by Robert Klane and starring Donna Summer, Jeff Goldblum, Debra Winger, DeWayne Jessie, Ray Vitte, Terri Dunn. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures and won an Academy Award in 1979. ==Other websites== * Category:1978 comedy movies Category:1978 musical movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Los Angeles
title: Thank God It's Friday
